summary: The module creates and manages a graph representation of Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates. It gathers resource definitions with line numbers and suppression data, builds a local graph linking resources, parameters, and variables through explicit and implicit dependencies, and converts the graph back into definition dictionaries enriched with breadcrumb metadata for traceability.
business_intent: To enable Checkov to perform static security and compliance analysis on ARM templates by modeling their structure and dependencies as a graph, allowing accurate detection of misconfigurations and policy violations with clear source mapping.
